CatDescriptText: Mr. Harry Diggs, 2451 Snyder Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1958, pg. 2 �Do you think that the numbers game should be legalized or outlawed?� answer reads: �I think that they should be legalized. And the reason is that if people like to play the numbers, why not let them play?  However, I don�t believe that they ever will be legalized.�
